mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM music_auction WHERE auctioncnt = #{auctionIdx}
SELECT recentpricetime FROM music_basic WHERE idx = #{idx}
SELECT histime FROM music_history WHERE idx = #{idx} ORDER BY histime DESC LIMIT 0,15
SELECT YEAR(feemonth) AS year, month(feemonth) AS month FROM music_feeinfo ORDER BY feemonth DESC LIMIT 0,1
SELECT idx FROM music_basic WHERE song = #{song} AND singer = #{singer}
SELECT * FROM music_mview ORDER BY singer asc
SELECT * FROM music_mview WHERE (avg3/sellprice*100) > 7 AND (avg6/sellprice*100) > 7 AND (avg12/sellprice*100) > 7 AND (avgall/sellprice*100) > 7 AND alltime > 48 AND cvall < 0.7 AND cv12 < 0.7

SELECT b.idx, b.song, b.singer, SUM(h.hisprice * h.hisunit) AS 'vol' FROM music_history h INNER JOIN music_basic b ON h.idx=b.idx WHERE h.histime BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 day) AND NOW() GROUP BY h.idx ORDER BY vol DESC LIMIT 0,10

SELECT b.idx, b.song, b.singer, SUM(h.hisprice * h.hisunit) AS 'vol' FROM music_history h INNER JOIN music_basic b ON h.idx=b.idx WHERE h.histime BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 WEEK) AND NOW() GROUP BY h.idx ORDER BY vol DESC LIMIT 0,10
